patterns: Is there a cultural club in srm?
responses: Yes we have cultural club in srm DSA community

patterns: How many Cycle test exam are there in each semester?
responses: There are 4 cycle test exams held in each semester

patterns: When are the semester exam held?
responses: Each semester have one final exam held at the end of semester

patterns: Is there a  sports club in srm?
responses: Yes we have sports club in srm DSA community

patterns: Is there a gaming  club in srm?
responses: Yes we have gaming club in srm DSA community

patterns: Is there a literature club in srm?
responses: Yes we have literature club in srm DSA community

patterns: Are there a  racing club in srm?
responses: Yes we have many racing  clubs in srm

patterns: Is there a dance club in srm?
responses: Yes we have dance club in srm DSA community

patterns: Is there a music club in srm?
responses: Yes we have music club in srm DSA community

patterns: Are there any coding club in srm?
responses: Yes we have many different coding  club in srm community

patterns: What is techpark building in college?
techpark building srm
responses: it is the most advance building which consist labs for research studies and host classes from 2 year

patterns: how many hostels are available for first year students
responses: there are 4 hostels available Kaari,Paari,Adhyaman,Nelson Mandela

patterns: What is the last entry timing for entering hostel
responses: 10 p.m is the last time to enter hostel ,you can ask for written permission from warden if you want to be outside for night

patterns: where is java canteen area and are there many shops their?
location of java
java canteen area in srm
responses: it is located near clock tower and is the canteen area of srm with variety of  different eatables shops available

patterns: what is Ub building and it's significance
where is Ub building
responses: Ub building is located near the main gate of srm and is used for hosting classes for first year,it is fully ac and consist of many important floors like foreign management affaris,Fees related issues ,library of srm

patterns: Are there any bank in Srm
location of bank atm in Srm
where are bank in srm
responses: Srm ub building consist of SBI bank & atm
There are also atm bank near clock tower and main block of srm

patterns: is there any transport service available in srm
transport service in srm
transport in srm
responses: SRM consist of bus service to travel inside the campus which is available till 9p.m

patterns: where is the mess to eat hostel food in srm
where can we eat hostel food
responses: for first year the mess is available inside sannsai building, for second year their are different messes according to the hostel student accommodate

patterns: is their any website where we can  access our attendance and updated result?
where can we check our attendance in website
How can we see our attendance
responses: academia.edu website which can be accessed by srm students shows results ,attendance ,time -table ,academic calender of srm

patterns: where can we pay our fees
where can we gets update regarding fees status?
responses: feekart is the website which provide update regarding fees status and you can pay fees there

patterns: do srm provide scholarship to students
do srm students gets scholarship if they score well?
how can we apply for scholarship in srm
responses: Srm provides semester wise scholarship to students who scores good percentile and they also provide scholarship to sports students

patterns: do we have student exchange program in srm
Can we study our semester abroad in srm through student exchange?
is there student exchange program in srm
student exchange program
responses: srm have ties with various international universities and they provide semester exchange program to the students who are interested in it

patterns: do srm have international students
are there international students in srm
international student in srm
responses: srm consist of international students from all over the world and many are exchanged student coming for semester studies

patterns: Do we get free checkup in srm hospital
is srm hospital free for students
responses: yes they provide free checkup for students and we only need to pay for medicines

patterns: how many blocks are there in srm
do srm consist of different blocks
what are blocks name in srm
responses: Srm consist of engineering block , architecture block, polytechnic block , Medical block, Mechanical & civil block

patterns: how many playground are in srm
do srm consist of playground
where are playground located in srm
responses: Srm consist of 2 playground one near techpark and one near medical block

patterns: do srm have indoor games facility
are there any indoor games in srm?
where is srm indoor games facility located
responses: Srm consist of a big indoor game facility located near srm medical block ,it consist of t.t tennis,and other indoor games

patterns: required attendance to attend exam
what is the attendance required to sit for exams
responses: 75% attendance is required to sit for exams in srm ,if not then they'll be facing arrears in the respective subject

patterns: is food delivery  accepted inside campus
at night is food delivery available
responses: yes food delivery is available inside campus ,but at nighttime we need to go to main gate to receive our order

patterns: how is placement in srm
Is there good placement in srm
placement of srm
responses: SRM provides various opportunity for students and placement is excellent in SRM for cse students it's one of the best place to enroll

patterns: do srm provide specialization with courses
can we get specialization in srm
is specialization available in srm
responses: Yes srm provides different specialization for many courses and we can choose it

patterns: is there wifi available in campus
free wifi in campus
how can we access wifi in campus
responses: every student can access free wifi in campus through unique password given to everybody and college mail id

patterns: do we need to carry college id in campus
use of college id
what can we use college id for
where can we use college id
responses: we need to carry college id with us everyday,it helps to identify the student and we can access places like library inside the campus borrow books etc

patterns: do we learn foreign language in srm
can we learn foreign language
what is foreign language course
responses: SRM provides students to choose which foreign language they want to learn,they can also further study it in extra credit course

patterns: is there any local market near srm
how far is local market from srm
responses: Pothari is the local market outside srm ,it consist of every type of daily need shops and other markets

patterns: are there any rental flats near srm
how can we rent flat outside srm
responses: We have different  society and pg's outside srm which are available for rents like abode,estancia ,VGN, green peral, Safa etc

patterns: do we have sports tournament in srm
are there sport tournament in campus
do srm conduct sport tournament
responses: We have multiple sports tournament in campus throughout the year ,it consist of local,state and national tournament

patterns: is there personality development course in srm
do srm provide personality development course
how can we personality development in srm
responses: SRM focus at personality development of student and from first year onwards we have classes regarding it

patterns: do we have competitive coding in srm
is there competitive coding course in srm
how can we prepare for competitive coding
responses: SRM provides CCC course for competitive coding and they also provide online platforms like hacker earth ,they also have various coding clubs in campus

patterns: Do srm provides holidays for north festivals
where can we see our holidays
do srm provides holidays for festivals
responses: SRM provides us calendar in academia where we can check our holidays

patterns: is there ragging in campus
do we have ragging
responses: SRM do not supports ragging and strictly prohibits it,strict action is taken against ragging in srm

patterns: how are measures against covid in srm
do srm takes measures against covid
responses: SRM follows ugc guidelines for covid measures,if there are cases of covid in campus immediate action is taken and quarantine guidelines are followed

patterns: do srm provide online courses
are there online courses in srm
how are online courses
responses: SRm have ties with coursera and AWS ,they provide free courses to srm students and we can learn from there

patterns: where is srm location
location of srm
responses: SRM kattankulathur  is located near pothari station,whereas the other one is located near ramapuram

patterns: Do srm provide interview preparation
is there  interview preparation
how is  interview preparation done?
responses: SRM provides classes and guides for student soo they can prepare for interview ,they focus on development of soft skills of students

patterns: Do srm provide faculty guidance to students
Is there any faculty help in srm
how can we report our issues
what do faculty do
responses: Srm assign faculty per batch of students i.e 70 students, they help us regarding any issues like marks ,attendance,fever etc

patterns: are there any fest in srm
do srm have fest
what fest are in srm
responses: SRM have 2 fest throughout the year.Aarush is the technical fest of srm and Milan is the cultural fest of srm

patterns: Can we choose subject we like
can higher year choose subject they like
how can we choose subject
responses: In higher year students can choose elective subjects from pool of available subjects,they are given on basics first come first serve

patterns: where is main campus located
what do we study at main campus
do we study at main campus
responses: Main campus is located near pothari station. The civil & mechanical and automation branches conduct their studies there also real time working projects related to these are made and tested there

patterns: what are labs available in srm
labs in srm
do we have labs in srm
responses: Srm have various labs like coding,EEE,chemistry,physics,mechanical etc all branches labs are scattered all around the campus

patterns: how is hostel life in srm
is hostel life good in campus
what is hostel life like in campus
responses: SRM hostel life is full of fun,we get connected to individuals from different parts of country ,and overall it's an unforgettable experience

patterns: how is mess food in srm
is mess food good
what is mess food like?
responses: SRM mess food is good according to the taste you like,for north indian students it's a little difficult to adjust but after some time they get used to it

patterns: how is srm environment
is srm environment good for studies
environment
responses: SRM environment is good for studies ,the teachers are helpful and they focus on development of students ,if we have any difficulty they help us to overcome it

patterns: do we have post office in srm
where is post office
post office location in campus
responses: SRM post office is located in front of main campus

patterns: do srm support research
is there any research in srm
research conducted in srm
responses: SRM is very supportive to research and they are constantly going around the campus in different fields ,if student have a good idea the srm faculty supports it and also provides financial aid for it

patterns: do we have MUN in srm
is SRM mun there
do srm go for mun
responses: Srm MUN is one of the biggest college mun in India ,It is held around Feb and students from all over the country comes to participate in it

patterns: what are the organization in srm
do we have organization
name of organization in srm
responses: SRm have different organization like Aaruush, DSA , Hackathon srm, DSC srm, Team robocon, Milan srm, team rudra, SRM iet  etc

patterns: do we have workshops in campus
are there workshops
How are the workshops in srm
responses: SRM supports individual developing their skills and it provides various workshops regarding different topics and we can hone our skills by attending them

patterns: where is auditorium
what is name of auditorium
is srm auditorium good
responses: T.p ganesan Auditorium inside campus one of the biggest Auditorium in India,it hosts all the main functions of srm ,workshops are conducted there and fest are conducted

patterns: what is DSA srm
use of DSA
how is DSA srm
responses: DSA is the student affairs body of srm,it helps to keep communication between higher ups and students also it maintain discipline in students

patterns: what are travel designation
travel designation in chennai
responses: Students can go to pondicherry ,Kerala ,Ooty, zoo
